sense.name: A row or line of people.
sense.examples: The entrance was guarded by ranks of soldiers. The ranks of policeman followed the crowd.

sense.name: Relative status.
sense.examples: His salary was determined by his rank and seniority. The British are very aware of rank. Colonel is a higher rank than Private.

sense.name: The ordinary (or full body of) the members of an organization.
sense.examples: He rose from the ranks to become a leader. The rank and file of the order disagree. They polled their ranks. He joined the ranks of the unemployed.
